title: Majestic-milf
author: Majestic-milf
content: I was looking at ways I could make micro payments for services that cost me cents and stumbled on Bitcoin Lightning Network.Â I was intrigued to find that I could make payments as low as 0.000001 BTC for services that require micro payments! Meaning I can pay for my local dish in BTC without delegating custody to a third party for fund trusting.With Lightning Network, multi signatures help keep the transaction open and transparent between both parties in which user A wants to buy commodities from user B and user C servers as an escrow which releases the funds when user A and B are both satisfied and then funds get disbursed with the sigs of the three users.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: I don't have a channel open with the lightning network at the moment but I thought you'd be able to go lower than 100 sats (considering they have nano and pico units)?

comments.author: Diplester6666
comments.body: I have been using Lightning Network for quite some time now and it's amaaaaaazing! You can transact for anything from a few cents to a few hundred dollars, for fees worth only few cents!
